public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object

Stores address book entries

isAlreadyThere

public boolean isAlreadyThere(Entry entry)
Determine whether an entry with same names as this one is already in the address book. Entry's equals method tests for a match.

Parameters:
entry - to be matched
Returns:
boolean indicates whether a match was found
